text: In the 1950 Major League Baseball World Series the New York Yankees won the world series again. They beat the Philadelphia Phillies 4-0. They won their 13th title Category:World Series Category:1950 in sports Category:1950 in the United States Category:1950s in Pennsylvania Category:1950s in New York (state) Category:20th century in New York City Category:20th century in Philadelphia
title: 1950 World Series
